memory[0] = 16'b1111111111111111; // NOP
memory[1] = 16'b1000000100000011; // LI r1 3
memory[2] = 16'b1000001000000010; // LI r2 2
memory[3] = 16'b1000001100000100; // LI r3 4
memory[4] = 16'b0000101000000000; // LD r1 0(r2)
memory[5] = 16'b1101000100000000; // ADD r1 r2
memory[6] = 16'b1101001100000000; // ADD r3 r2
memory[7] = 16'b1100100011010000; // OUT r1
memory[8] = 16'b1100000011110000; // HLT
